overview: In over 170 feature-length films, more than 160 series episodes and 10 short films, he records more than 70 film deaths. "Dead Again" arranges the final shots of his respective acting presences into a collage of action, mystery, fantasy, sci-fi, western, horror, thriller and
tagline: Lance Henriksen dies his way through U.S. genre cinema and television of the last 50 years.
title: Dead Again
